General.Name: Prime Electronics & Satellitics Inc
General.Description: Prime Electronics & Satellitics Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells digital satellite communication products worldwide. The company provides headend systems; home networking products; low noise block-converters; multi-switches; set-top boxes; and satellite products for satellite TV, CATV, and IPTV markets. It serves TV operators, telcos, and distributors. Prime Electronics & Satellitics Inc. was founded in 1995 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
